title: God's Glory among the Nations
description: A comprehensive course on mission that explores God's heart for the nations and your role in the Great Commission.
about: This course is designed to help you understand the mission of God and how He invites His people to join Him in His redemptive plan‚Äîa plan moving toward a multitude from every nation, tribe, people, and language worshiping Jesus. Welcome to God's Glory among the Nations: A Course on Mission! If you want to see how everyday discipleship connects to God's purposes among the nations, this course is for you.
whoItsFor: Believers, churches, leaders, and anyone wanting to understand God's global mission and their role in it.
whatYoullLearn: üìå Understand God's mission from Scripture
ü§ù Embrace the Church's mission
üí° Discover your role in exalting God and seeing Him worshiped among the nations
üå± Learn from disciples who have engaged the missionary task both locally and globally

facebook.content:
God's heart beats for the nations. In this comprehensive course, explore His mission and discover your role in the Great Commission. Every believer has a part to play in seeing every nation worship Jesus.

üëâ Start the course: imb.pathwright.com/library/gods-glory-among-the-nations-a-course-on-mission-192219/about/

üëâ Start the course: imb.pathwright.com/library/gods-glory-among-the-nations-a-course-on-mission-192219/about/

title: Blueprint: Recognizing God's Design for His Glory among the Nations
description: Designed specifically for NextGen individuals and leaders, this course walks through God's plan for the world and our part in the big story of the Bible.
about: Welcome to Blueprint: Recognizing God's Design for His Glory among the Nations! In this course, you'll get to know God's mission, discover His method, and be invited to join Him in His work around the world. You'll hear stories of how disciples of Jesus are engaging in God's mission today by sharing the gospel and making disciples among unreached peoples and places.
whoItsFor: Believers, churches, leaders, and anyone who wants to know God's mission and their role in it.
whatYoullLearn: üìñ What is the story of the Bible?
ü§∑üèª Are there still people who haven't heard the message of the gospel?
üåè How is God at work in the world today?

title: Short-Term Trip Training
description: Prepare for short-term mission trips with comprehensive training resources for both participants and leaders.
about: Whether you're going for one week or several months, proper preparation makes all the difference. Get equipped with comprehensive training resources designed for both mission trip participants and leaders.
whoItsFor: Church leaders and team members who are preparing to join God's mission on a short-term trip. The seven lessons may be studied over a concentrated training weekend or spread over a few months leading up to the trip.
whatYoullLearn: üåç Explore the basis of missions and how it relates to God's glory
üîß Consider practical tools and tips on fundraising, packing, and traveling well
üìå Learn about the missionary task and how each team member plays a role in God's mission

ü§ù Discover strategies for teamwork and ways for members to use their giftings
üïå Understand different world religions, cultures, and contexts

title: Southern Baptist Polity
description: Understand the structure, governance, and cooperative work of the Southern Baptist Convention.
about: We hope this tool will serve as an overview of the Southern Baptist Convention (SBC) and how we can partner in reaching the nations, together. Welcome to Southern Baptist Polity! This course is your on-ramp to understanding how the Southern Baptist Convention (SBC) is structured, how it functions, and how its cooperative efforts fuel international missions.
whoItsFor: Believers, church members, ministry leaders, mission teams, and anyone who wants to better understand SBC structure and how it supports the missionary task.
whatYoullLearn: üîé Discover the basics of Southern Baptist polity‚Äîhow the SBC is organized and how decisions are made
‚õ™ Understand the SBC's cooperative structure, including how churches partner through the Cooperative Program and other giving pathways
ü§ù See how SBC entities, like the IMB, work together to advance the gospel and sustain a missionary presence around the world
üöÄ Explore how your church can engage more effectively with the SBC to support and participate in the missionary task

facebook.content:

title: Hermeneutics
description: Learn proper methods for interpreting and applying Scripture accurately in your teaching and discipleship.
about: In this course, you'll learn how to read and interpret the Bible faithfully so you can better understand what it says, what it means, and how to live it out. Welcome to Hermeneutics! This introductory course will equip you to read and interpret the Bible faithfully so you can understand what Scripture says, what it means, and how to live it out.
whoItsFor: Believers, churches, leaders, and anyone who wants to grow in understanding and applying Scripture.
whatYoullLearn: üîë Grasp key principles of biblical interpretation and why they matter for reading God's Word
üìú Learn how to study different biblical genres in light of their historical, cultural, and literary contexts
üèÉ Practice interpreting Scripture through guided exercises and sample passages
üå± Grow in your understanding of God's Word with the aim of deepening your relationship with Him

facebook.content:
Interpret Scripture accurately. Learn proper methods for understanding and applying God's Word in your teaching, discipleship, and personal study. Sound hermeneutics is essential for faithful ministry and effective discipleship.

title: Sent to the Workplace
description: Learn how to be a missionary in your everyday workplace and share the gospel with colleagues and clients.
about: Learn how your work matters to God and how you can make a difference in your workplace, wherever that might be. Welcome to Sent to the Workplace! As Christ followers, we have been sent as His ambassadors to our workplaces, whether that's the marketplace, at home, or as volunteers in our communities.
whoItsFor: Believers, churches, leaders, and anyone who desires to be challenged to rethink their work from God's perspective.
whatYoullLearn: üèÜ Learn how your work matters to God and has eternal significance

üõê Hear stories of how others connect their work to their faith and local church through practical, actionable steps

facebook.content:
